text.data: Matelite: Damn it!![0xfc][0x28] The Imperial army's approaching![0xfc][0x36] I never expected them to attack us here...[end1][end]
We need to buy some time!![end1][end]
Sendak: If we are to cross the river, then we will need to freeze it using magic.[end1]
Let us show them how to fight, [character][0x0]![end1][end]
If you melt the ice bridge with fire magic, the enemy will be unable to move!![end1][end]
Matelite: What're you doing?! Are you gonna help me already or what?!![end1][end]
Let's move!! Take Kahna Castle by force!![end1][end]
Ah... So we are crossing the river... Be careful when using fire magic.[end1][end]
Ice bridges can be melted with fire magic, so be careful!![end1][end]
Matelite: I never thought I would be done in so soon...[end1][end]
Sendak: [character][0x0]...[0xfc][0x20] This cannot be...[0xfc][0x30] How I longed to fight alongside you in future battles...[end1][end]
Don't isolate your dragon!! Command it to do something!![end1][end]
Don't forget about the [0x22]Come[0x22] and [0x22]Wait[0x22] commands!![end1][end]
King Kahna, he's...!![0xfc][0x30] The Granbelos generals have penetrated the castle!![end1][end]
Matelite: Damn it!! We have to protect the King!![end1][end]
